Chicco Dentifricio Toothpaste - Apple and Banana (50 ml) Price: Rs.245

During their growing stages babies need to be tended with great care and responsibility to ensure their healthy growth and development. The Dentifricio Toothpaste – Apple and Banana from Chicco is produced with special fun features that make brushing the baby’s teeth an exciting activity and encourage them to inculcate the habit of doing it on a daily basis.

This Chicco Dentifricio Toothpaste – Apple and Banana can suitably be used for both girls and boys and is ideal for babies who are between the age group of 6 months to 3 years old. Made to be Fluoride Free this Chicco Toothpaste contains preservative free formula and low abrasion formula for its safe usage. The Xylitol in this toothpaste makes it an appropriate choice to use for babies and makes it convenient to use on a daily basis.
